aboutMe.firstParagraph: I am passionate about web programming, I really like the frontend so I feel more comfortable using JavaScript. I have knowledge in PHP and databases, I also use to learn other technologies by myself.
aboutMe.secondParagraph: I'm currently doing my degree and I'm looking for the opportunity to get my first job as a web developer.

projectSection.firstParagraph: A small gallery with some of my projects. Keep in mind that some of them are personal and others were made during my internship.
